name: Desert Explorer
description:
Desert Explorer is a cute game about a small wizard who explores the desert in the search for mysterious Tangram pieces.

This is a very early prototype to showcase mechanics. Download the game now for android to get an early sneak peek.

We appreciate your feedback, please leave us a comment and tell us what you think.

Please also take a minute to fill out the survey we are doing for the game for the college course (it takes around 3 minutes):

https://forms.gle/mwsq3bHLAsF6m31p7
